name: Clockroach
description: Admin and user have different levels of access in the websiteâ€™s dashboard.
Users can register using email and password or can use a Google account to sign in.
Users or Admin must sign in to view the dashboard or to place an order.
Users will be able to manage their orders from the dashboard and add reviews. An admin will be able to add other admins, manage all orders, manage products, etc.
techUsed: HTML, CSS, JS, React, Firebase, Material UI, React Hook Form, React Router, Node JS, Node Express, MongoDB.

name: Tourara
description: Tourara is a Bangladesh based travel agency.
Users can book new packages and manage their previous bookings.
Users can book new packages and manage their previous bookings.
Responsive Design.
techUsed: HTML, CSS, JS, React, Firebase, Bootstrap, React Hook Form, React Router, Node JS, Node Express, MongoDB.

name: Ambicioz Medical
description: Here patients can look for the suitable packages needed for their medical needs.
Visitors can find a doctor suitable for their needs from the find a doctor section after logging in.
Users can see any service details by clicking on the button details.
Fully responsive for mobile and tablet too.
techUsed: HTML, CSS, JS, React, Firebase, Bootstrap, React Hook Form, React Router.

name: AmFly
description: This is a simple E-Commerce website
User can purchase multiple items according to their needs
User can see detail view of their carts and add or remove any product from cart.
User can easily move from one page to another as this is a single page application.
techUsed: HTML, CSS, JS, React, React Router.

name: Skillup
description: Skillup is a online training firm.
A user can see detail overview of any course offered by skillup
Anyone can read blogs from the blog section of the website
This website is under production, many functionalities will be updated soon...
techUsed: HTML, CSS, JS, React, React Router
